name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): LOST: We Have To Go Back
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): LOST: We Have To Go Back
long_desc: This course will be an indepth overview of all things LOST. Premiering in 2004, LOST became an immediate success with its focus on character based storytelling and use of flashbacks. Despite ending in 2010, the show continues to be discussed due to its still unsolved mysteries and highly debated finale. Topics for the course will include everything from the Dharma Initiative and mysteries of the Island to theories and the fundamental question Were they dead the whole time The production and legacy of the groundbreaking show will also be discussed. No prior knowledge of LOST is required, and those looking for a reason to watch the show are highly encouraged to enroll.
